singsong.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a way of speaking in which your voice keeps rising and falling
singsong.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I recognized her soft singsong immediately.
singsong.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an informal occasion when people sing songs together
singsong.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We had a bit of a singsong later.
